    • com.hellokaton.blade.options中CorsOptions的使用

      返回CorsOptions的com.hellokaton.blade.options中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      CorsOptions CorsOptions.allowCredentials()
      By default cookies are not included in CORS requests, but this method will enable cookies to be added to CORS requests.
      CorsOptions CorsOptions.allowedHeaders(String... headers)
      Specifies the if headers that should be returned in the CORS 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers' response header.
      CorsOptions CorsOptions.allowedMethods(HttpMethod... methods)
      Specifies the allowed set of HTTP Request Methods that should be returned in the CORS 'Access-Control-Request-Method' response header.
      CorsOptions CorsOptions.allowedOrigins(String... origins) 
      CorsOptions CorsOptions.allowNullOrigin()
      Web browsers may set the 'Origin' request header to 'null' if a resource is loaded from the local file system.
      static CorsOptions CorsOptions.create(String... origins) 
      CorsOptions CorsOptions.disable()
      Disables CORS support.
      CorsOptions CorsOptions.exposeHeaders(String... headers)
      Specifies the headers to be exposed to calling clients.
      static CorsOptions CorsOptions.forAnyOrigin()
      Creates a Builder instance with it's origin set to '*'.
      CorsOptions CorsOptions.maxAge(long max)
      When making a preflight request the client has to perform two request with can be inefficient.
